entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
